summary: This is an email from ITV News producer Kathryn Milofsky to an individual named Mr. Berman, requesting a Skype interview about his request to interview Prince Andrew regarding the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein. The email promotes ITV News's reach and credibility to persuade Mr. Berman to participate.

persons.context: The recipient of the email, whom Kathryn Milofsky is requesting to interview about his request to interview Prince Andrew concerning the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.

events.title: ITV News Interview Request
events.description: Kathryn Milofsky of ITV News emails Mr. Berman to request a Skype interview about his request to interview Prince Andrew regarding the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.

keyFacts: A major UK news network (ITV News) sought an interview in June 2020 regarding a request to interview Prince Andrew about the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.
The email demonstrates ongoing media interest and public scrutiny of Prince Andrew's connections to Jeffrey Epstein years after Epstein's death.
The producer references a 'recent MLA request' in connection with the interview topic, indicating a possible Mutual Legal Assistance request related to the investigation.
The email highlights the significant audience reach of ITV News to persuade the recipient to grant the interview.
The correspondence is a direct media solicitation, not a legal document or testimony, but shows the case remained a high-profile news item.
